data.title: Bank of Jiujiang Announces Board Committee Reshuffle
data.description:
An update from Bank of Jiujiang Co., Ltd. Class H ( (HK:6190) ) is now available.

Bank of Jiujiang Co., Ltd. announced adjustments to the composition of its Board’s special committees, effective from October 31, 2025. Ms. Wang Wanqiu and Mr. Guo Jiequn, both independent non-executive Directors, have been reassigned between the Nomination and Remuneration Committee and the Consumer Rights Protection Committee. These changes reflect the Bank’s ongoing efforts to optimize its governance structure, potentially impacting its strategic focus on consumer rights and executive management.

data.description:
Viva China Holdings Limited ( (HK:0933) ) has shared an announcement.

Viva China Holdings Limited announced the acquisition of an additional 30,646,500 shares of Li Ning Company Limited, amounting to approximately HK$508,919,000. This acquisition represents about 1.19% of the total issued shares of Li Ning Co and is classified as a discloseable transaction under the Listing Rules. The acquisition was financed through external sources and settled in cash, reflecting the prevailing market prices. This move strengthens Viva China’s investment portfolio and its association with Li Ning, a leading sports brand in the PRC.

More about Viva China Holdings Limited

Viva China Holdings Limited is a multi-brand operator primarily engaged in the design, development, branding, and sales of sports and lifestyle apparel and footwear. The company operates mainly in the United States, the United Kingdom, Europe, the PRC, Hong Kong, Japan, and the Republic of Korea. It is incorporated in the Cayman Islands and listed on the Main Board of the Stock Exchange.

Average Trading Volume: 5,036,916

Technical Sentiment Signal: Buy

Current Market Cap: HK$5.78B

data.title: Sundy Service Group Acquires Prime Parking Lots in Hangzhou
data.description:
Sundy Service Group Co. Ltd ( (HK:9608) ) has shared an update.

Sundy Service Group Co. Ltd has entered into an agreement to acquire 50 parking lots located at the basement level of Sundy Building in Hangzhou for RMB10,586,700. This acquisition aligns with the company’s strategy to preserve capital and invest in premium operational assets, benefiting from high demand due to its prime location. The parking lots are expected to provide stable cash flows and additional revenue streams, enhancing the company’s overall profitability and value for shareholders.

More about Sundy Service Group Co. Ltd

Sundy Service Group Co. Ltd is a company incorporated in the Cayman Islands, operating in the real estate industry. The company focuses on acquiring and managing high-quality assets, including parking lots, to optimize revenue structures and enhance profitability.

data.title: Shanghai Fudan-Zhangjiang Bio-Pharmaceutical Redirects IPO Funds to New Photodynamic Drug Project
data.description:
An announcement from Shanghai Fudan Zhangjiang Bio Pharmaceutical Co ( (HK:1349) ) is now available.

Shanghai Fudan-Zhangjiang Bio-Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. announced a strategic reallocation of funds from its A Share initial public offering. Due to delays in the clinical research progress of its Hemoporfin registration project in the United States, the company will redirect the remaining proceeds to a new innovative research and sustainable development project in photodynamic drugs. This decision aims to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of resource utilization, while continuing the original project’s Phase II clinical research as a sub-project under the new initiative.

More about Shanghai Fudan Zhangjiang Bio Pharmaceutical Co

Shanghai Fudan-Zhangjiang Bio-Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. operates in the biopharmaceutical industry, focusing on the development and commercialization of innovative drugs. The company is particularly known for its work in photodynamic technology and biological medicine, with a market focus on both domestic and international pharmaceutical sectors.

Average Trading Volume: 6,446,935

Current Market Cap: HK$1.06B

data.title: Luzhou Xinglu Water Proposes Governance Overhaul
data.description:
Luzhou Xinglu Water (Group) Co., Ltd. Class H ( (HK:2281) ) has provided an announcement.

Luzhou Xinglu Water (Group) Co., Ltd. has announced several proposed changes to its corporate governance structure, including amendments to its Articles of Association, the abolition of its Supervisory Committee, and the adoption of new rules for its General Meeting and Board of Directors. These changes aim to align with national laws and regulatory requirements, enhancing the company’s operational and procedural systems. The proposed changes will be subject to approval by the company’s shareholders at a general meeting, signifying a strategic shift in the company’s governance model to potentially streamline operations and improve oversight.

data.title: Shin Hwa World Limited’s Rights Issue Oversubscribed
data.description:
The latest update is out from Shin Hwa World Limited ( (HK:0582) ).

Shin Hwa World Limited announced the results of its Rights Issue, which offered one Rights Share for every existing share held. The Rights Issue was oversubscribed, with valid applications exceeding the total number of Rights Shares offered by approximately 3.69%. The allocation of excess Rights Shares was conducted on a pro-rata basis, fulfilling all conditions set out in the prospectus and rendering the Rights Issue unconditional. The over-subscription resulted in the full discharge of the Underwriter’s obligations under the Underwriting Agreement.

More about Shin Hwa World Limited

data.title: Luzhou Xinglu Water Enters Landscaping and Cleaning Service Contract
data.description:
An update from Luzhou Xinglu Water (Group) Co., Ltd. Class H ( (HK:2281) ) is now available.

Luzhou Xinglu Water (Group) Co., Ltd. has entered into a two-year landscaping and cleaning service contract with Xinglu Property Management, a subsidiary of its controlling shareholder. The contract, valued at approximately RMB1.4223 million per annum, covers services for the company’s office premises and water facilities. This transaction is classified as a continuing connected transaction under Hong Kong’s Listing Rules, requiring reporting and announcement but exempt from circular and independent shareholders’ approval due to its size.

data.title: Shenwan Hongyuan Updates Interim Dividend Details for 2025
data.description:
Shenwan Hongyuan Group Co., Ltd. Class H ( (HK:6806) ) has issued an announcement.

Shenwan Hongyuan Group Co., Ltd. announced an update regarding its interim dividend for the six months ended June 30, 2025. The update includes details on the default currency and amount of the dividend, exchange rate, ex-dividend date, and other important dates related to the dividend distribution. The dividend declared is RMB 0.35 per 10 shares, with a payment date set for December 24, 2025. The announcement also outlines the withholding tax implications for different types of shareholders, including individual and corporate investors, both resident and non-resident. This update is significant for stakeholders as it provides clarity on the financial returns and tax obligations associated with the company’s dividend distribution.

More about Shenwan Hongyuan Group Co., Ltd. Class H

Shenwan Hongyuan Group Co., Ltd. operates in the financial services industry, focusing on securities and investment services. The company is known for providing a range of financial products and services, including brokerage, wealth management, and investment banking, primarily targeting clients in China and Hong Kong.

data.title: Wai Hung Group Faces Compliance Challenge After Director Resignation
data.description:
Wai Hung Group Holdings Ltd. ( (HK:3321) ) just unveiled an update.

Wai Hung Group Holdings Limited announced the resignation of Ms. Tung Ching from her roles as executive director and committee member, effective October 31, 2025, to focus on other business commitments. Her departure results in non-compliance with certain Hong Kong Stock Exchange listing rules, prompting the company to seek suitable candidates to fill the independent non-executive director positions to restore compliance.

data.title: China Risun Group Sells Subsidiary Stake in Strategic Move
data.description:
China Risun Group Ltd. ( (HK:1907) ) has issued an announcement.

China Risun Group Ltd. announced the disposal of its 100% equity interest in a subsidiary to Xuyang New Energy for RMB54,686,200. This transaction, classified as a connected transaction due to the involvement of the company’s controlling shareholder, does not require independent shareholders’ approval. The sale aligns with the company’s strategic adjustments, impacting its financial consolidation and potentially altering its market positioning.
